name: Githzerai Zerth
lore: Zerths are githzerai monks who have mastered the manipulation of time, able to briefly shift foes through the time stream. They serve as elite guardians in the churning chaos of Limbo, defending githzerai monasteries with devastating psychic strikes and temporal disruptions. Their mental discipline is legendary, and they draw on psionic power to shape reality around them.

traits.name: Mental Discipline
traits.description: The githzerai has Advantage on saving throws against the Charmed and Frightened conditions.

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.description: While the githzerai isn't wearing armor and isn't using a Shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

multiattack.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
actions.description:
The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components (spell save DC 16):

At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible)

1/day each: Plane Shift (self only), See Invisibility

bonusActions.name: Temporal Strike
bonusActions.description: Immediately after the githzerai hits a creature with an Unarmed Strike on this turn, the githzerai deals an extra 16 (3d10) Psychic damage to that target. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be moved to a different point in the time stream. The target vanishes, being removed from play. At the end of the githzerai's next turn, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied and has the Stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

savingThrow.targets: the target hit by the Unarmed Strike

conditions.duration: until the end of the target's next turn

onFailure.effects: The target vanishes, being removed from play. At the end of the githzerai's next turn, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
